content: the rustic melody bobble scarf is a cozy textured crochet scarf perfect for cool days this design uses layered bobble stitches to create soft texture and dimension worked in muted autumn hues of king cole crescendo aran yarn you ll need just 2 balls of yarn and a 5 mm crochet hook to complete this quick and stylish project a matching hat pattern will be released soon so stay tuned **grab your free scarf pattern from my website or purchase the ad-free pdf right here on ravelry ** **join the cal newsletter here ** https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d 1 this is just one of the patterns included in our september scarf of the month club collection this pattern will be available as a free pdf download until january 20 2025 at 11 59 pm est new york time 23 59 for cal participants simply add the pattern to your cart before 11 59 pm est on january 20th and it will show as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on january 19 2025 at 9 00 pm est new york time 20 00 i ve included instructions to allow you to make a project scarf shawl or even a blanket to your own custom size using any yarn and hook combo you d like > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is available to > purchase from my pattern shop ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram
